Reusable containers: Instead of throwing away plastic containers, use reusable containers for storing food. You can wash and reuse these containers for your next meal.
Recycling: Set up a recycling system at home to manage your waste. You can separate your waste into different categories such as paper, plastic, glass, and metal.
Donate: Donate items that you no longer need or use. You can donate clothes, furniture, and other items to a local charity.
Repurpose: Repurpose items that you no longer need. For example, you can use old jars as vases or pencil holders.
Avoid single-use items: Avoid using single-use items such as plastic bags, straws, and cups. Instead, use reusable bags, straws, and cups.
